title: Riding on His Coattails and Surviving the Apocalypse - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Josei   Slice of Life
tags: Apocalypse   Fantasy World   Female Master   Female Protagonist   Futuristic Setting   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magical Space   Military   Post-apocalyptic   Prostit**es   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   R*pe   Second Chance   S*xual Abuse   Strong Love Interests   Sword Wielder   Zombies
author: Ru Ruo Zhen Xi   如若珍惜
description: After living in a post-apocalyptic world for three years, Lou Xiaoluo is torn apart and devoured by a group of zombies. She is reborn and goes back four years, a year before the apocalypse. Since she has the chance to do it again, she starts to get well prepared for what's coming. She had to bounce between different men to survive during the apocalypse in her previous life. So now, she will make herself more robust for the apocalypse, and if she needs support, she will find the most powerful man.>
